cta.description: Whether you're looking to buy quality Japanese machinery or sell your used equipment, we're here to help with professional service and competitive pricing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services

items.question: What types of machinery do you buy and sell?
items.answer: We deal with a wide range of industrial machinery including manufacturing equipment, construction machinery, agricultural equipment, and specialized industrial tools.

items.question: How do you determine the price for used machinery?
items.answer: Our pricing is based on market research, equipment condition, age, and current demand. We provide transparent assessments with detailed reports.

items.question: Do you handle international shipping?
items.answer: Yes, we provide complete international shipping services including documentation, customs clearance, and logistics management.

items.question: What is your typical response time?
items.answer: We typically respond to inquiries within 24 hours and can complete machinery purchases within 48 hours for qualified equipment.

items.question: Do you provide after-sales support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive after-sales support including installation guidance, maintenance advice, and technical assistance.
